channel.title: Compiling Editor-GTK on EasyRPG Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Compiling Editor-GTK on EasyRPG Wiki

item.title: Building Editor-GTK with CMake
item.description: Requirements cmake-2.8 or greater GTK+ 3.4 or greater Vala compiler 0.16 or greater Build Run “cmake ${PATH TO editor/builds/cmake} && make”. If you want to build it with debug mode pass “-D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug” to cmake.

item.title: Building Editor-GTK with GNU Build System
item.description: Requirements Autoconf 2.63 or greater Automake 1.11 or greater GTK+ 3.4 or greater Vala compiler 0.16 or greater Build Run ./autogen.sh && make
